Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 68th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2008...
Earned first career win on 6/11/2012...
Traded from Cleveland to Pittsburgh on 3/2/2014 (Going to PIT: 2B R. Weeks, 3B A. Littlejohn, P J. Lester, P R. Perry. Going to CLE: 3B J. Arias, 3B R. Shaffer, P D. Bundy, P B. Halsey)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/3/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $3,200,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/2/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $1,580,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/20/2022, off Tyrell Jenkins (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/4/2023, off Joe Towe (ATL)...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 2/7/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $3,300,000 per year...
Injured on 4/12/2024 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
